wikipedia_page.main: Steven Scutt (born 1956), is a male former athlete who competed for England.  He won a gold medal for England in the 4x400m relay at the 1982 Commonwealth Games held in Brisbane, Queensland, Australia.  He was also a two time United Kingdom champion in the 400m race.

response: She was engaged to and then married fellow international athlete Steve Scutt in 1980.
